SEARCH
Package org.anchoranalysis.mpp.feature.energy.saved

Class EnergySavedPairs

Object
EnergySavedPairs
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdatableMarks
public class EnergySavedPairs extends Object implements UpdatableMarks
Stores and manages pairwise energy interactions between marks.

This class implements UpdatableMarks to allow for dynamic updates of mark pairs and their energies.
